jobDescription: Data Center Technician  We are currently hiring entry level telecom technicians with 0-3 years of experience for commercial work. Current or Recent Laney College, IBT, and other trade school students please apply. Interviews are currently being held, work starts ASAP. This is a great opportunity for individuals looking for a start within the wiring, telecommunications or electric industry.  Please send your resume to jasmine.s@outsource.net for consideration. Job Duties: Routing CAT 5 and CAT 6 Cable  Terminating RJ-45 Jacks  Pulling electrical wiring through electrical conduit  Terminating electrical panels, set fixtures, outlets, and various electrical devices  Installing cable racks Compensation: Option to enroll in Medical, Dental, Vision, and Life Insurance  Starting pay $16-30/hr or depending on experience  Weekly Pay  Referral Bonuses (ask for details!)  Please send your resume to jasmine.s@outsource.net for consideration.  About Outsource:Outsource is the Nations leading providers of Electricians. We work EXCLUSIVELY in building wiring, and we have been placing technicians of all levels with the right companies since 1998 so we know a thing or two about making a good match.Outsource is the Nations leading providers of HVAC Technicians.
